# Sound Burst (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F/DF (a musical instrument)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 10-ft.-radius spread

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 366

You blast an area with a tremendous cacophony. Every creature in the area takes 1d8 points of sonic damage and must succeed on a Fortitude save to avoid being [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round. Creatures that cannot hear are not [[Stunned|stunned]] but are still damaged.
